title: Game-Based Programming Design: Expert Workshop for Secondary Education Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Programming Syntax Comprehension and Game Development Tool Usage Experience
context.additional_context: A course designed to strengthen programming education capabilities based on game development, applicable to secondary school environments, targeting professionals.

learning_goals: Design at least three types of educational programming assignments using game engines (e.g., Unity/Scratch).
Identify and apply at least five game mechanics that enhance learner engagement.
Develop at least two formative assessment tools combining digital/analog feedback.
Implement at least one difficulty-adjustment algorithm tailored to secondary school learners' characteristics.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
